review: i really enjoy being able to access some of the classic TV shows of the past

review: This  device is amazing.  Super easy to use.  Already cancelled part of my cable TV as there is so much to watch I only need the basics.  Best Christmas gift I've received in many years.
author: Leroy Lind

review: I was disappointed that I am unable to download/stream amazon videos to my news fire tv.  I think the problem is my internet, although I am supposed to have high speed internet (but it is not very fast).  I am going to upgrade my Ethernet modem and hope that will help!
author: tere

review: I bought this and I am returning! Netflix would not work and this was the main reason I bought. On the NFL app, there was a lot of buffing.

review: I love it just wish prime had more new movies and that the youtube and other google apps were available

review: User friendly and easy to navigate, my only gripe is that Amazon prime free movies are not listed.
